definition: to try to find out/to trace/to track down
to chase after/to seek/to do one's utmost to seek or procure sth/to recall
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)

sentences.english: When Ed finds out, Sam agrees to help the FBI capture several key members of the cartel.
sentences.chinese: 艾德發現，曼霞協助警方追查組織的幾位頭號人物。

sentences.english: Write in Oedipus tracking down before the king the murderer killed a center events.
sentences.chinese: 中寫俄狄浦斯追查殺害前王兇手這一中心事件。

sentences.english: The police have promised to hound down those responsible for the explosion.
sentences.chinese: 警方已保證要追查此次爆炸事件有責任的人員。

sentences.english: Can you run the rumour back to its source?
sentences.chinese: 你能追查出這個謠言的來源嗎？
電子銀行交易的不可否認與可追查責任特性。

sentences.english: The rumor has been traced back to a bad man.
sentences.chinese: 那謠言經追查是個壞人造的。

sentences.english: They tried to trace  the rumour to its source.
sentences.chinese: 他們試圖追查謠言的根源。

sentences.english: If you do not consider the customer complaint as the top-priority item, and never trace and analyze it actively.
sentences.chinese: 你不把客戶抱怨當作優先解決的事項，主動追查檢討。

sentences.english: However, we did eventually track it down.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我們最終會跟蹤追查到它。
帕克追查到格羅斯曼一家。

sentences.english: You and your faithful friend Dupin set out for Hungary to get to the bottom of things.
sentences.chinese: 你和你的摯友杜平出發去匈牙利去追查事情的真相。

sentences.english: You can then use these to trace or cut and paste into new floor plans of your own design.
sentences.chinese: 你可以利用這些追查和醬或減成新平面圖貴自己設計。

sentences.english: Do you know why I do what I do?
sentences.chinese: 知道爲什麼我追查你到這裏？

sentences.english: They want to run those rumours and slanders back to their sources.
sentences.chinese: 他們想要追查那些流言蜚語的根源。

sentences.english: LiuJianGong etc to protect civilians at the same time, let the stone I dare to chase the murderer.
sentences.chinese: 劉建功等人保護平民的同時，讓石敢當去追查兇手。

sentences.english: Three people are under arrest with investigators looking for a fourth.
sentences.chinese: 其中三人被逮捕，漏網的一人正在被搜捕人員追查。

definition: to pursue/to be after/to hunt down (the perpetrator of a crime, an escaped prisoner etc)
to find out/to ascertain/to get to the bottom of/to clarify
lit. to follow the vine to get to the melon/to track sth following clues
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down
to hunt and arrest (fugitives)/to track down and arrest/a manhunt
lit. beat the grass to scare the snake (idiom)/fig. to inadvertently alert an enemy/to punish sb as a warning to others
to follow a trail/to trace/to pursue
